pr_title: timetracking: add configuration for displaying time in 12 hour format

timeline.bodyText: A better name would be Time format
timeline.author: Adam-
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,14 +39,14 @@
 	String STOPWATCHES = "stopwatches";
 
 	@ConfigItem(
-		keyName = "estimateRelative",
-		name = "Show relative time",
-		description = "Show amount of time remaining instead of completion time",
+		keyName = "timeFormatMode",
+		name = "Display time as",

replies.bodyText: That's much better. Honestly had no idea what to call this.
replies.author: Hydrox6

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/timetracking/TimeTrackingConfig.java b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/timetracking/TimeTrackingConfig.java
index 6a44c13e9..cb24e6b9b 100644
--- a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/timetracking/TimeTrackingConfig.java
+++ b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/plugins/timetracking/TimeTrackingConfig.java

@@ -40,8 +40,8 @@ public interface TimeTrackingConfig extends Config
 
 	@ConfigItem(
 		keyName = "timeFormatMode",
-		name = "Display time as",
-		description = "What format to display times in.",
+		name = "Time format",
+		description = "What format to display times in",
 		position = 1
 	)
 	default TimeFormatMode timeFormatMode()

timeline.message: timetracking: add configuration for displaying time in 12 hour format
